short_summary: Procurement of Tactical Operational Flight Trainer (TOFT) Throttle Grip assemblies
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. Delivery is requested to Department of National Defence, 25 CFSD Montreal, 6363 Rue Notre, Dame St E., Montreal, QC, Canada, H1N 3V9, no later than 30 November 2023.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: Tactical Operational Flight Trainer (TOFT) Throttle Grip Assemblies**

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)

**Procurement Number:** cb-9251-51778870

**Publication Date:** September 19, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** October 4, 2023, at 14:00:00

**Requirement Overview:** The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the supply of Tactical Operational Flight Trainer (TOFT) Throttle Grip Assemblies.

**Scope of Work:**

Deliveries are required for the items listed below:

* Item 1: Switch Assy, 5-way TGL, NSN: 5930-20-A0X-2186, Quantity: 5
* Item 2: SLIDE SWITCH, NSN: 5930-20-A0X-2187, Quantity: 2
* Item 3: PUSH BUTTON SWITCH, MOMENTARY, NSN: 5930-20-A0X-3232, Quantity: 2
* Item 4: THUMBWHEEL, NSN: 5930-20-A0X-2185, Quantity: 5
* Item 5: TOGGLE SWITCH, NSN: 5930-20-A0X-3231, Quantity: 1

**Delivery Location:** Department of National Defence, 25 CFSD Montreal, 6363 Rue Notre Dame St E, Montreal, QC, Canada H1N 3V9

**Bid Requirements:**

* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the Part Number and NSCM/CAGE of the product offered.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Region of Opportunity:**

* North America (Amérique du Nord)

**Contracting Entity:**

* Department of National Defence (Ministère de la défense nationale)

**Contact Information:**

* Joseph Catanzariti, Purchaser
* Phone: (819) 939-4271
* Email: joseph.catanzariti@forces.gc.ca

**Tender Documents:**

The full tender notice, including the tender description and any amendments, is available on the Canada Buys website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canad
